Message:
I’ve made it this far believing
hard work would pay off...

But, the ideals I pursued
were fleeting—the justice
I admired was nowhere
to be found.

I was enveloped in total darkness,
but a beam of light shone through.

and you helped me remember
that silver light I once admired.

to be strong and gentle...
To be someone virtuous
who could protect everyone...

This sword will not rest
until my ideals become reality.

I will persist in my faith
in justice...
